name: Haunted futa mansion - DLC_2
description:
This is the 2nd DLC for this game: https://vaasko.itch.io/haunted-futa-mansion

The DLC contains only 1 level, so only 1 futa "monster"

~Same bugs as the main game~

Installation:

  • Windows: add the DLC_2 file in the same folder as the main game, the game has to be at least v2, link above
  • Android: the file contains the base game + DLC_2, so u don't need the base game here
